chapter.title: 24 Hour Replacement
chapter.para:
The 24 Hour Replacement Appliance is identified by the
symbol. If the 24 Hour Replacement Appliance is not installed, please refer to for installation instructions.

The 24 Hour Replacement Appliance works in conjunction with the Metavize secure data center to maintain daily backups of your ⪚ configuration. Should a disaster occur (fire, storm, etc) which renders the ⪚ machine unusable, a new machine with your existing configuration will be shipped to your location within 24 hours.

sect1.title: Administrative Interface
sect1.para: Unlike many of the other software appliances within ⪚, there is little administration associated with the 24 Hour Replacement Appliance. The only administrative screen shows the times when backups occurred, as discussed in .

sect2.title: Events Tab
sect2.para: The Events tab contents is shown in .
The Events Tab is another implementation of an Event Log, as described in . The complete list of columns and their meaning is as follows.

listitem.para: The time the backup event took place
The action which took place (always backup).
This column indicates if the backup attempt succeeded (success) or failed (failed).
In the case of a failure, this field holds additional details on the failure.
